definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: The sign here indicated where I should go.
sentences.chinese: 這個標識表記標幟指出了我該去的地方。

sentences.english: This is the sign of a person who is respected.
sentences.chinese: 那是一小我被敬服的標識表記標幟。

sentences.english: Display the total mark as an output.
sentences.chinese: 作爲顯示輸出的總標識表記標幟。

sentences.english: X marks the spot for that clue, so look carefully.
sentences.chinese: “X”標識表記標幟着線索的地點，所以仔細視察。

sentences.english: The testing does not have errors, application has a good effect.
sentences.chinese: 測試沒有表記誤差，應用效果良好。

sentences.english: Want the look of a digital watch with the cachet of a classical timepiece?
sentences.chinese: 想看磕暌剮經典優異標識表記標幟的數字電子手錶嗎？

definition: long-term considerations/to take the long view
Takeshima (Korean Dokdo 獨島|独岛[Du2 dao3]), disputed islands in Sea of Japan
to write a word incorrectly/typo/(medicine) to mistakenly transplant (an infected organ etc)
to make a sound effect/sound effect/(historical linguistics) to reconstruct the sound system of an archaic language
honorific (e.g. in grammar of oriental languages)
The Thirty-Six Stratagems, a Chinese essay used to illustrate a series of stratagems used in politics, war, and in civil interaction/all the possible schemes and stratagems
